A4.text: Gold was found by James W. Marshall at Sutter's Mill in Coloma, California.

A5.text: Gold was discovered in California as early as March 9, 1842, at Rancho San Francisco, in the mountains north of present-day Los Angeles.

A6.text: The California gold rush occurred in the western foothills from 1848 through 1855.
